column5: The Angling Edge show is on Directv channel 604 started at 10. They haven't gotten to Hawk Lake yet. The Pursuit channel is what it says.

Not sure if that was the original show that aired or if this was just a combination of shows and they split 2 shows into one? The show posted on the Hawk Lake website has way more footage. Man, those are some big fish though. lol
They made two shows. One a full length show (30 minutes) and the second show half that with a second segment. We are now in re-runs as they first aired in January. Glad you enjoyed it. -FT
